creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: unsigned; 3/4 portrait of woman facing PL; coyly cradling partially folded white fan under chin; bright red detailing in kimono collar; large headdress; blue and white hair ornament at back; two hair sticks at front with red beads; pink upper lip, green lower lip
object_name: Hanging scroll, one of a triptych
title: Geisha [right of a triptych of Three Beauties]
